"How to Increase Cold Resistance":
"Cold Resistance can be increased to 100% in the following ways:
・Activate 2 Regional Mags for a Regional Mag Boost (20%)
・Make Quick Food using any Kvaris Material (30%)
・Use Cold Resistance +50% items (50%)
・Add the Special Ability Decold Standard II to 2 pieces of equipment (30%)"
"Items that boost Cold Resistance, such as Cold Resistance +50%, can be obtained from <yellow>Leso<c>, the Rayjord Gorge Prep Squad Quartermaster, and may also drop from enemies in Lost Central."
"Special Ability Capsules that grant <yellow>Decold Standard II<c> may drop from enemies in Rayjord Gorge, and can be obtained from <yellow>Leso<c>, the Rayjord Gorge Prep Squad Quartermaster."
